titleStmt.title: Repaymnet of a loan
titleStmt.author: Plutarche, daughter of Harpaesis and Soeris daughter of Horos

msContents.summary: Loan by Soeris, Ploutarche's mother, to Achilleus her son in law, in acc. with contract notarized by the public registry of Oxyrhynchos in Phar. (3/27-4/25/49); the money originates from Thermouthion selling her deceased father's share of a house in the Laura Hippodromou to Didymos, son of Didymos (the sale was made with her husband Dioskous as kyrios). The loan is probably equivalent to loans from wives to husbands.

msItemStruct.note: There is one more glass with mounted papyri with inv. no 74-94 at the end of the series of glasses concerning the archive. Locker B. There are 8 fragmnets that could be parts of 3 or 4 papyri.
